name: Please Don't Let My Sunflower Die, Thanks.
name_original: Please Don't Let My Sunflower Die, Thanks.
description:
Please Don't Let My Sunflower Die, Thanks is a frantic action game where you must defend your sunflower from pests and ensure it gets enough sunlight and water. If you don't - the sunflower will wilt and eventually die! You have three abilities at your disposal. The watering can to keep the sunflower well-watered, the wind power to keep the clouds at bay, and the flyswatter to crush those pesky insects! Stay vigilant, and please don't let my sunflower die! Thanks.

This game was made for the Global Game Jam 2023    with the theme 'Roots' hosted by Birmingham City University.

Credits: Joe Bevis - Programming Avneet Sekhon - Programming Malachi Kiloh-Munns - Programming Kris Burgess-James - Music/Programming Oakley - Design Aine Keohane - Art Chloe Tong - Art Danny Scott - Art
